can some one tell me what would be wonrg thnkz

item.title: Help with safe zone
item.dc:creator: @The_Wise_Guy .Kaboom
item.description:
@The_Wise_Guy wrote:

I made a tut once on this… here it is

Tutorial Name: Making safe zones
How hard 1-10: 2
Required Skills: java basics
Full Credits: Me.
Tutorial:
Step 1:
First open up client.java

Step 2:
Search for

public boolean nonWild() {

You should see something like this

public boolean nonWild() { if((absX >= 3248 && absX <= 3261 && absY >= 3430 && absY <=3440 ) || (absX >= 2668 && absX <= 2683 && absY >= 3414 && absY <= 3429) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3260 && absY >=3435 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3253 && absY >=3431 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 ) || (absX >=2642 && absX <= 2651 && absY <= 3268 && absY >=3273 ) || (absX >=2942 && absX <=3197 && absY >=2992 && absY <=3257 ) || (absX >= 2729 && absX <= 2746 && absY >= 3461 && absY <= 3477 ) || (absX >= 2642 && absX <= 2651 && absY >= 3268 && absY <= 3273 ) || heightLevel == 1) return true; else return false; }

Step 3:
Ok. to add a safe zone i will explain

|| (absX >= 1stxxxx && absX <= 2ndxxxx && absY >= 1styyyy && absY <= 2ndyyyy) ||

Step 4:
For the first XXXX And first YYYY You want to go to the you want to go the Most SOUTH - WEST of were you want to add the safe zone so in my case this would be it

So now i will fill it in
|| (absX >= 2730 && absX <= 2ndxxxx && absY >= 3460 && absY <= 2ndyyyy) ||

Now go to the most NORTH - EAST part of were you want your safe zone and fill in the second 2ndxxxx and 2ndyyyy

And fill that in so

|| (absX >= 2730 && absX <= 2743 && absY >= 3460 && absY <= 3455) ||

Hope that helped some newbies XD!

Add that to the end of
public boolean nonWild() {

Read full topic

item.description:
@mage_ur_as wrote:

public boolean inSafezone() { // by Haurp00ned
if((absX >=2708 && absX <=2816 && absY >=3149 && absY <=3235 ) || (absX >=3067 && absX <=3099 && absY >=3520 && absY <=3464 ) || (absX >=2438 && absX <=2447 && absY >=3082 && absY <=3098 ) || (absX >=3545 && absX <=3582 && absY >=3267 && absY <=3308 ) || (absX >=2812 && absX <=2867 && absY >=3230 && absY <=3310 ) || (absX >=2705 && absX <=2735 && absY >=9800 && absY <=9832 ) || (absX >=2528 && absX <=2548 && absY >=4710 && absY <=4725 ) || (absX >=2370 && absX <=2420 && absY >=5125 && absY <=6169 ) || (absX >=3021 && absX <=3057 && absY >=4816 && absY <=4850 ) || (absX >=2508 && absX <=2540 && absY >=4627 && absY <=4670 ))
return true;
else
return false;
}

they all work except the edge 1
